summary: Completed testing of requested features for IT Inventory System. All features working: Maintenance logs with performed_date, PDF reports by period (day/week/month), logo_url field in companies, equipment status reports by company, and equipment assignments to employees. Fixed 2 bugs during testing.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - minor accessibility issue

passed_tests: Backend: Create maintenance log with performed_date field
Backend: Create corrective maintenance with all fields (diagnosis, solution, repair_time)
Backend: Download maintenance report by day period
Backend: Download maintenance report by week period
Backend: Download maintenance report by month period
Backend: Create company with logo_url field
Backend: Update company logo_url
Backend: Get companies includes logo_url field
Backend: Download equipment status report by company
Backend: Create equipment assignment
Backend: Equipment status changes to 'Asignado' after assignment
Backend: Return assignment
Backend: Equipment status returns to 'Disponible' after return
Frontend: Login with admin@inventarioti.com / admin123
Frontend: Maintenance page loads with 'Bitácoras de Mantenimiento' title
Frontend: Maintenance form has 'Fecha de Realización' field with default date
Frontend: Reports dropdown shows day/week/month options
Frontend: Company form has 'URL del Logo (opcional)' field
Frontend: Equipment status report button visible on company details
Frontend: Assignment form has equipment, employee, and delivery date fields

bugs_fixed.issue: logo_url field not saved when creating company
bugs_fixed.fix: Added logo_url to company dict in create_company endpoint

bugs_fixed.issue: PDF generation failed with Unicode bullet point character
bugs_fixed.fix: Replaced '•' with '-' in PDF text to use ASCII-compatible characters

updated_files: /app/backend/server.py - Fixed Unicode bullet point in PDF generation
/app/backend/tests/test_requested_features.py - New test file for requested features
seed_data_creation: Created test maintenance logs with performed_date, test companies with logo_url, test equipment assignments
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified: 1) Maintenance logs now include performed_date field that appears in form and is saved correctly. 2) PDF reports can be downloaded by period (day/week/month) from the Reports dropdown on Maintenance page. 3) Companies have logo_url field that is saved and shown in form. 4) Equipment status report by company can be downloaded from Companies page ('Reporte Equipos' button). 5) Equipment assignments to employees work correctly with status transitions (Disponible -> Asignado -> Disponible).

maintenance_logs.performed_date_field: Present in form with default current date

companies.equipment_status_report: Button 'Reporte Equipos' available on company details
